title: ANDavanE sharaNam
sahitya:
ANDavanE sharaNam sharaNam pazhaniyANDavanE sharaNam


anupallavi

  tANDavamADum tillaiyambadivAsan tanda nal jyOtiyE sharavaNa bhavanE


caraNam    nAn marandAlum en nAvunai maravAdE nAthA guhA enrE navilum eppOdumE 
UN marandiDuvEn urakkam marandiDuvEn uDaluyir marandAlum unai maravEnE
